pullRequest.title: [miio] add gosund plug & Vacuum 1C STYTJ01ZHM
pullRequest.bodyText:
[miio] add gosund plug & Vacuum 1C STYTJ01ZHM
Add 2 miot devices
Vacuum 1C STYTJ01ZHM dreame.vacuum.mc1808
cuco goplug cuco.plug.cp1
Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen marcel@verpaalen.com

commit.message:
[miio] add gosund plug & Vacuum 1C STYTJ01ZHM

Add 2 miot devices
Vacuum 1C STYTJ01ZHM dreame.vacuum.mc1808
cuco goplug cuco.plug.cp1

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

nodes.bodyText: Are these supposed to be percentage values?

nodes.bodyText: what is the difference between these fields? Can they be Number:Time instead?
